Translation.String: Enable weekends
Citizens won't go to school or work over the weekends, and will be more active through the day and night compared to weekdays.
Allow workers to go out for lunch
Some citizens will leave work at lunch and go to a nearby shop before returning.
Use modified date bar
Changes the date/time bar at the bottom left of the screen into one that supports the day/night cycle and events.
Increase use of parking spaces
Allows a larger search radius for parking spaces. Will cause cars to travel through buildings the higher the radius.
Parking search radius
Improved commercial, industrial and office demand
Demands are linked together, and are based off of populated residential buildings.
Improved residential demand
Demand becomes linked to the number of empty workplaces.
Ghost mode (coming soon)
Deactivate most of the mod for removal at a later date.
24 hour clock
Allows use of either a 12 hour or 24 hour clock on the date/time bar.
Date format
Change how the date is formatted on the date/time bar.
Set the language the mod is displayed in.
School earliest start time
School latest start time
School earliest end time
School latest end time
Don't travel to school if under this many hours left
Work earliest start time
Work latest start time
Work earliest end time
Work latest end time
Don't travel to work if under this many hours left
Enable random events
Allows events to happen at certain unique buildings in your city.
EXPERIMENTAL: Modified time progression
Allows you to change the speed of the day and night cycle.
EXPERIMENTAL: Time progression speed
The time progression multiplier to apply to the day and night cycle.
EXPERIMENTAL: No cooldown timer on random events
Don't allow events to empty fully before creating a new one.
EXPERIMENTAL: Allow commercial fix for inactive buildings
Enables a fix to stop commercial buildings becoming inactive. Disable only if there are massive problems with it on in your city.
DEVELOPER: Print all unique buildings in your city to the console
Prints the names of all unique buildings currently placed in your city to the console. Use only if creating your own custom events.
DEVELOPER: Enable "Force" XML parameter to immediately create a chosen event
Allows the "Force" parameter to force an event to happen immediately upon applying these settings.
